title: Syallabus
content:
Hey  
i'll be joining the aiml dept this year  
can someone send the syllabus/curriculum

comments.body: Check the discord server, it's in the home page of this reddit.

Check the FAQs: [https://bit.ly/pesu-faq](https://bit.ly/pesu-faq)

You will find the link related to syllabus and other related topics. The server link is there.

Please do guide 
Unable to find aiml syllabus
Did you try checking the links we shared?

I’m new on discord
I don’t know where to find the link

Which server did you join? 

If you joined PESU Discord, just post a message there on the Ask a Senior channel and someone will redirect you. 

If you directly joined PESU Media, post a message on the common channel and someone will do the same.
